summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with The Baseball Club Of Seattle, L.P., and acceptance pursuant to that agreement of Major League Baseball All Star Legacy Grant funding to support field improvements at Lower Woodland Playfield; and increasing an appropriation in the 2002 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation by making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
